title: Biden will grant clemency to 78 people and announce reentry initiatives to mark 'Second Chance Month' - CNN
content:
1. Biden will grant clemency to 78 people and announce reentry initiatives to mark 'Second Chance Month'  CNN
  2. Biden grants three pardons, 75 commutations for individuals serving for nonviolent drug crimes  Fox News
  3. Biden pardons former Secret Service agent and 2 others  Yahoo News
  4. Biden issues first pardons of his presidency  11Alive
  5. Biden to grant clemency to 78 people, including pardon for former Secret Service agent  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden will mark "Second Chance Month" at the White House on Tuesday, commuting the sentences of 75 people serving time for nonviolent drug offenses, issuing full pardons for three individuals who the administration says have worked toward rehabilitation and unveiling new actions aimed at easing the transition back to normal life for the formally incarcerated.
